title: OpenAI Invests in Sam Altmanâ€™s New Brain-Tech Startup Merge Labs
contentSnippet: Merge Labs has emerged from stealth with $252 million in funding from OpenAI and others. It aims to use ultrasound to read from and write to the brain.
content: Merge Labs has emerged from stealth with $252 million in funding from OpenAI and others. It aims to use ultrasound to read from and write to the brain.
